parameters.prompt:
Based on the mood data, provide 2-3 quick recommendations:

Mood: {{ $json.mood_data.mood }}
Energy: {{ $json.mood_data.energy_level }}/10
Sleep: {{ $json.mood_data.sleep_hours }}h
Stress: {{ $json.mood_data.stress_level }}/10

Provide recommendations as a JSON array: ["recommendation 1", "recommendation 2"]
